languages.text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.
languages.original_text:
В начале своего хода корабль восстанавливает 20% {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Если корабль должен быть уничтожен впервые, вместо этого он полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g}. Однако это восстановление временно, а корабль продолжает разрушаться, теряя 25% максимального показателя целостности корпуса в начале каждого раунда.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing hull.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated at full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering damage equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing hull.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering damage equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

languages.text:
В начале своего хода корабль восстанавливает 20% {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Если корабль должен быть уничтожен впервые, вместо этого он полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g}. Однако это восстановление временно, а корабль продолжает разрушаться, теряя 25% максимального показателя целостности корпуса в начале каждого раунда.

Zu Beginn seines Zuges repariert das Schiff 20 % seines beschädigten {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfes{/g}.
Steht das Schiff kurz vor der Zerstörung, wird es es einmal pro Kampf mit vollem Rumpf wiederhergestellt. Dieser Effekt ist allerdings nicht von Dauer, und das Schiff löst sich weiter auf und erleidet zu Beginn seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 25 % seines maximalen Rumpfes.
languages.original_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} repariert das Schiff 20% seines beschädigten {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfes{/g}.
Einmal pro Kampf, wenn das Schiff kurz vor der Zerstörung steht, wird es stattdessen mit vollem Rumpf reanimiert. Diese Reanimation ist jedoch nicht dauerhaft, und das Schiff löst sich weiter auf und erleidet zu Beginn seines Zuges Schaden in Höhe von 25% seines maximalen Rumpfes.

languages.text:
Au début de son tour, le vaisseau récupère 20 % de ses points de {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} manquants.
Une fois par combat, lorsque le vaisseau est sur le point d'être détruit, il est « réanimé » avec le nombre maximum de points de coque. En revanche, cette réanimation n'est pas permanente. Le vaisseau continue donc à se désintégrer en subissant des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} représentant 25 % de son nombre maximum de points de coque au début de son tour.
languages.original_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text:
Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le vaisseau récupère 20 % de ses points de {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} manquants.
Une fois par combat, lorsque le vaisseau est sur le point d'être détruit, il est « réanimé » avec le nombre maximum de points de coque. En revanche, cette réanimation n'est pas permanente. Le vaisseau continue donc à se désintégrer en subissant des dégâts représentant 25 % de son nombre maximum de points de coque au début de son tour.

languages.text:
每个回合开始时，这艘舰船会修复20%缺失的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}耐久。
每场战斗中，当这艘舰船即将被摧毁时，它会以100%的舰体耐久复活一次。不过，这种复活并非永久复活。该舰船会继续解体，每个回合开始时会受到舰体{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于舰体最大耐久的25%。
languages.original_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text:
每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，这艘舰船会修复20%缺失的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}耐久。
每场战斗中，当这艘舰船即将被摧毁时，它会以100%的舰体耐久复活一次。不过，这种复活并非永久复活。该舰船会继续解体，每个回合开始时会受到舰体伤害，等同于舰体最大耐久的25%。

languages.text:
Al principio de su turno, la nave recupera un 20 % del {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} perdido.
Una vez por combate, cuando la nave está a punto de ser destruida, se reconstituye con el casco al máximo. Sin embargo, esta reanimación no es permanente y la nave sigue desintegrándose, sufriendo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g} iguales al 25 % de su casco máximo al principio de su turno.
languages.original_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text:
Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la nave recupera un 20 % del {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} perdido.
Una vez por combate, cuando la nave está a punto de ser destruida, se reconstituye con el casco al máximo. Sin embargo, esta reanimación no es permanente y la nave sigue desintegrándose, sufriendo daños iguales al 25 % de su casco máximo al principio de su turno.

languages.text:
ターン開始時、この船は損傷した{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}を20%回復する。
戦闘ごとに一度、この船が破壊されそうになった時、代わりに船体が完全な状態で復活する。
ただし、この復活は永続的なものではなく、船体は崩壊し続け、ターン開始時に最大船体値の25%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text:
At the start of its turn, the ship repairs 20% of its missing {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.
Once per combat, when the ship is about to be destroyed, it is instead reanimated with full hull. However, this reanimation is not permanent, and the ship continues to disintegrate, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum hull at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この船は損傷した{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}を20%回復する。
戦闘ごとに一度、この船が破壊されそうになった時、代わりに船体が完全な状態で復活する。ただし、この復活は永続的なものではなく、船体は崩壊し続け、ターン開始時に最大船体値の25%に等しいダメージを受ける。
